txt.en: The western hillside has been secured. The gates to the eastern hillside have opened
Hyacinth's entranceway has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples
<rgb=#FF0000>A counterattack has been launched against Hyacinth's entranceway</rgb>
The courtyard of the Great Smials has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A roar echoes from near the Great Willow</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Edilina Proudfoot has been defeated</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A growl echoes from the west farms</rgb>
Edilina's Entranceway
Eastern Hillside
'The Tooks will remember your patronage and aid for many generations to come.'
<rgb=#FF0000>A counterattack has been launched against the western hillside</rgb>
'The Shire belongs to Sharkey now. You best be leaving before you get hurt. Boys, get 'em!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A faint chirp of sickle-flies comes from the Great Willow</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>Freed the southern hillside</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>The counterattack has been defeated. The eastern hillside is secure. It is safe to press on</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>Freed the western hillside</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>Freed Hyacinth's entranceway</rgb>
The eastern hillside has been secured. The gate to the courtyard of the Great Smials has opened
<rgb=#00FF00>Freed the eastern hillside</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A cackle rolls across the Great Smials, 'I'll dig my way in and be eating hobbits for dinner!'</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>Freed Edilina's entranceway</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>A counterattack has been launched against the eastern hillside</rgb>
'You keep pressing around. We will get prepared from within.'
<rgb=#00FF00>With the courtyard in your control, the gates to the doorway of the Great Smials open. The half-orc leading the assault is angry</rgb>
The Control Point has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples.
<rgb=#00FF00>The half-orc leading the assault has fallen. The remaining brigands and goblins are scattering. The Great Smials are safe</rgb>

Tuckborough is the chief village of Tookland and home to the Thain of the Shire. Goblins and half-orcs seek to capture it in the name of Sharkey, the brigand chieftain troubling Bree-land and the Shire.
Edilina's entranceway has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples
Mathi has fallen.
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A laugh erupts, 'The Great Smials will burn!'</rgb>
'I will make you regret ever coming here!'
Hyacinth's Entranceway
'All within the Great Smials thank you greatly for your aid. The Took line will forever be in your debt.'
The Great Smials has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples
<rgb=#00FF00>The counterattack has been defeated. The western hillside is secure. It is safe to press on</rgb>
Courtyard of the Great Smials
<rgb=#FF0000>A Bounder has been defeated</rgb>
Western Hillside
The eastern hillside has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples
Free the southern hillside
Free the western hillside
Free Hyacinth's entranceway
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: The bog-lurker stretches and awakens in anger</rgb>
Free the eastern hillside
The counterattack has been defeated. It is safe to press on
Free Edilina's entranceway
'Dark one! Send me aid!'
Free the courtyard of the Great Smials
'I must get back to my flowers and garden. They will require much work, but it is work I will gladly do.'
Defeat the half-orc at the doorway to the Great Smials and claim the Great Smials
'I think I might just have to name my next new pie creation after you!'
Mathi must survive the assault
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: FÃ­throkh has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Big Fright falls to your mighty blow</rgb>
The Great Smials
<rgb=#00FF00>The counterattack has been defeated. Hyacinth's entranceway is secure. It is safe to press on</rgb>
'Please save us!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Murbarash has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
The first step to breaking the siege on the Great Smials is to reclaim the south and west sides of the hill.
With the south and west sides in your control, it is now time to break the enemy's hold on the eastern hillside.
The hillsides have been claimed for the Free Peoples. Now the courtyard has opened and may be assaulted.
The courtyard has fallen. Now all that remains is to defeat the leader of the assault and break the siege.
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Old Root falls to your mighty blow</rgb>
'Three cheers for our rescuers. Hip Hip!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: GhÃ¢shfog has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
'I would be honoured to call you a Bounder.'
'All in the Shire owe you a great debt.'
'There is much repair to do, but I would rather repair than rebuild.'
'Oh please don't let them get me!'
'We are in a terrible plight! Sharkey's men have locked the Tooks up inside the Great Smials!'
'It is just before harvest, so the foodstocks are running low! Please, drive off the brigands and goblins!'
The southern hillside has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples
'I will see if there are any in the Shire who can aid us, but it will take time, do not wait for me. The Tooks depend on you!'
'I will go alert the others. You keep pressing on!'
<rgb=#FF0000>A counterattack has been launched against Edilina's entranceway</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Hyacinth Took has been defeated</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>The counterattack has been defeated. Edilina's entranceway is secure. It is safe to press on</rgb>
'All this fuss and trouble. I am going back inside and not coming out until you have this taken care of.'
The western hillside has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples
'Filzof has been defeated! Now, claim the banner, and the Great Smials will be ours once more!'
Southern Hillside
'I shall help you defend the Smials!'
Trouble in Tuckborough
A counterattack has been launched by the enemy
